library("webex")
library(ggplot2)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path='../../../images/')
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE)


part=function(reset=FALSE){
  if(reset){ pp <<- 0}
  pp <<- pp+1
  rr=letters[pp]
  
  return(rr)
}

part(TRUE)
part()
